LanguageData.SZ_HiddenFaction.label: Divine Beast
LanguageData.SZ_HiddenFaction.description:
These monsters only exist in the mountain and sea myths of ancient China, but when the culture of China spread to the marginal world, some mad scientists resurrected these monsters. They are dangerous and unusual, leaving only ruins and bursts of debris wherever they go. Howling, when these monsters show up in your colony, all you can do is fight back. 

<color=#33d733>Monsters recorded: </color>
Nian Beast
